summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or staff schedule for a corrections facility (likely MCC New York) for the third quarter of 2019, specifically showing assignments for an individual named Noel, T. It details shift assignments, sick leave, and days off, and is dated the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Noel, T

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for MCC New York for the third quarter of 2019.
The document shows detailed daily assignments including SHU (Special Housing Unit) coverage, sick leave, and days off for staff member Noel, T.
The log covers the period immediately surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, showing staff assignments on August 9-12, 2019.
The document was created on August 12, 2019, two days after Epstein's death.
Assignment codes include SHU #1, SHU #2, SHU #3, 9 NORTH, 10 SOUTH, and STAFF SEARCH, indicating various posts and duties within the facility.
